name: BoatTrip
desc: Location and scheduling information for a boat trip.

items.name: arrivalBoatTerminal
items.desc: The terminal where the boat reservation ends.

items.name: arrivalTime
items.desc: The scheduled time the boat arrives.

items.name: departureBoatTerminal
items.desc: The terminal where the boat reservation begins.

items.name: departureTime
items.desc: The scheduled time the boat departs.

items.name: identifier
items.desc: The boat’s number or other identifier.

items.name: name
items.desc: The boat or boat route’s name.

items.name: provider
items.desc: The organization providing the boat trip.
